Name: Dire Hit
Description: Raises chances of a Critical Hit in battle

Name: Full Restore
Description: Restores all HP and cures all status ailments

Name: Guard Spec
Description: Prevents stat reduction in a battle

Name: Max Elixir
Description: Restores all PP to all moves

Name: Max Ether
Description: Restores all PP to one move

Name: Max Revive
Description: Revives a fainted Pokemon to max HP

Name: Moon Stone
Description: Evolves Clefairy, Jigglypuff, Nidorina and Nidorino

Name: Poke Doll
Description: Trade for TM31 in Saffron, Allows escape from battle

Name: PP Up
Description: Increases the max PP of a move

Name: Rare Candy
Description: Raises a Pokemon's level by one

Name: Revive
Description: Recovers a fainted Pokemon to half max HP

Name: Water Stone
Description: Evolves Eevee, Poliwag, Shellder and Staryu

Name: Great Ball
Description: Greater chance of catching Pokemon than a Pokeball

Name: Ultra Ball
Description: Greater chance of catching Pokemon than a Great Ball

Name: Safari Ball
Description: A special ball for use in the Safari Zone

Name: Bike Voucher
Description: Redeem at Cerulean Bike Shop for a free Bicycle

Name: Card Key
Description: Unlocks doors in the Silph Co. building

Name: Coin Case
Description: Holds 9999 Casino coins for use at Celadon Casino

Name: Dome Fossil
Description: Used to clone Kabuto at the Cinnabar Island Laboratory

Name: EXP. All
Description: Divides EXP from battle between all party members

Name: Gold Teeth
Description: Return to Safari Zone Warden and receive HM04

Name: Helix Fossil
Description: Used to clone Omanyte at the Cinnabar Island Laboratory

Name: Itemfinder
Description: Detects hidden items in close proximity

Name: Lift Key
Description: Unlocks the elevator in the Team Rocket Hideout, Celadon City

Name: Oak's Parcel
Description: Deliver to Prof. Oak in Pallet Town and receive a Pokedex

Name: Old Amber
Description: Used to clone Aerodactyl at the Cinnabar Island Laboratoy

Name: Pokedex
Description: Records all information about Pokemon seen and caught

Name: S.S. Ticket
Description: Use to board the S.S. Anne in Vermilion City

Name: Secret Key
Description: Unlocks Blaine's Gym on Cinnabar Island

Name: Silph Scope
Description: Allows Ghosts to be detected in the Pokemon Tower, Lavendar Town

Name: Town Map
Description: Shows your position in the Pokemon World
